Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to My Life In Pink by Strawberry.
My Love A hate Affair is a pretentious and poorly shot flick that leaves me indifferent. There is no tension, no prang of the heart as I enjoy the Hello Laddies concert.
An Academy Award. Un deserves all the praise
